parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description. The description can be up to 200 characters in length.

parameters.name: IpControlName
parameters.description: The name of the ACL. The name must be 4 to 50 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). The name cannot start with an underscore (\_).``

parameters.name: IpControlPolicys
parameters.description: The information about the policies. The information is an array of ipcontrolpolicys data.

parameters.name: IpControlType
parameters.description:
The type of the ACL. Valid values:

*   **ALLOW**: an IP address whitelist
*   **REFUSE**: an IP address blacklist
